Title: Exposed
Plot: After receiving a tip from "Rebel", Matt and Peter race to Building 26 to rescue Daphne and recover files that will expose the government's plans for those with abilities. Claire finds help from an unlikely source in smuggling Alex out of the city. As Sylar and Luke continue their road trip, Sylar begins to have memories of his father that lead him to the truth about his mother. Meanwhile, "The Hunter" puts his own agenda into action with an explosive surprise for one of our heroes.
GuestStars: David H. Lawrence XVII, Randall Bentley, Zeljko Ivanek, Ashley Crow, Taylor Cole, Jonny Siew, Joshua Rush, Natalie Salins, Angela Martinez, Dan Shadwell, Jeff Campbell, Jason E Kelley, Frank Maharajh, Kelly Michae
